summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1357, for the improvement of East Roy Street, from North Broadway to Eastlake Avenue and Lakeview Avenue, as established by Ordinance No. 10022, from East Roy Street to Eastlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and stairways thereon, together with all necessary cross walks, etc., under Ordinance No. 15005 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
